mil7.3.5:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘navaya tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.3.5:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, nava bahuvidhadarusanghatasamavayena bahumpi janam tarayati;
mil7.3.5:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena acarasilagunavattappativattabahuvidhadhammasanghatasamavayena sadevako loko tarayitabbo.
mil7.3.5:1.4: Idam, maharaja, navaya pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.5:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena bahuvidhakilesaumivegam labhasakkarayasasilokapujanavandana parakulesu nindapasamsasukhadukkhasammananavimananabahuvidhadosaumiveganca sahitabbam.
mil7.3.5:2.3: Idam, maharaja, navaya dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.5:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, nava aparimitamanantamaparamakkhobhitagambhire mahatimahaghose timitimingalamakaramacchaganakule mahatimahasamudde carati;
mil7.3.5:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena tiparivattadvadasakaracatusaccabhisamayappativedhe manasam sancarayitabbam.
mil7.3.5:3.3: Idam, maharaja, navaya tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.5:3.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena samyuttanikayavare saccasamyutte—
mil7.3.5:4.1: ‘Vitakkenta ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, “idam dukkhan”ti vitakkeyyatha, “ayam dukkhasamudayo”ti vitakkeyyatha, “ayam dukkhanirodho”ti vitakkeyyatha, “ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada”ti vitakkeyyatha’”ti.
